items.description: Built AI chatbot enabling customers to self-serve ledger categorization. Achieved 50% cutomer engagement and 98% accuracy on categorized transactions.
Automated ledger catgeorization of 30% of remaining monthly uncategorized transactions by deploying per-client ML models.
Earned Bench's Impact Award, celebrating "outstanding performance" and making " huge impact toward achieving our mission".
Increased Plaid connection opt-in rate by 30% by creating a new user onboarding experience.
